description:
Fearing Kagami will run out of stamina when he enters the zone, Riko pulls Kuroko off the court, strengthens the defense with second years, and tells Kagami to focus on offense. However, Akashi chooses to mark Kagami, and he even stops Kagami`s in the zone attacks with his Emperor Eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On ne peut pas rêver mieux, non ?
